formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Z = 1.2 * (Working Capital / Total Assets) + 1.4 * (Retained Earnings / Total Assets) + 3.3 * (EBIT / Total Assets) + 0.6 * (Market Value of Equity / Total Liabilities) + 1.0 * (Sales / Total Assets)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
